name: Pacbase: Avoid too many Total Lines of Code (-P)
description: Large entities are more difficult to read and manage. `!xA!`The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.`!xA!`Total Lines of Code measures the LOC of the Program/TP including its Macros.
output: This report lists all Pacbase Programs, Online Programs and PMS (Macros) with more than the number of lines of code defined in threshold. It provides the following information: Object full name, Number of LOC
rationale: Large entities are more difficult to read and manage. `!xA!`The threshold for the number of lines of code is configurable at will.`!xA!`Total Lines of Code measures the LOC of the Program/TP including its Macros.
remediation: Review the design of the Program, Online Program or PMS (Macros) to reduce its size
